title: Open your eyes

description: Describes the kinds of effective service which senior girl scouts can give to their communities in small towns and in big cities. Explains that the projects of these teenage girls are related to such subjects as poverty, conservation, disadvantaged pre-school children, Native American affairs, and the physically handicapped.
